content: I think a lot of people in D7 have asked for ability to place the description just below the field label and there have been various attempts with contrib and theme hooks to do that. I've done a quick port of https://www.drupal.org/project/label_help. It works well enough but there are a lot of open issues for making it work with X field types. I think this would be much easier in core and a big win for not too much effort
I know that this is something I've wanted to do on many occasions.
We have the Form element Label module https://backdropcms.org/project/fel.
